system.description: Effect: The user reduces their HP by 1/2 their Max HP and creates a Substitute. The Substitute's HP is equal to 1/2 the sacrificed HP. The user then switches out with another Pokemon in thier own Party, granting their replacement the Substitute.

actions.name: Shed Tail
actions.description: Effect: The user reduces their HP by 1/2 their Max HP and creates a Substitute. The Substitute's HP is equal to 1/2 the sacrificed HP. The user then switches out with another Pokemon in thier own Party, granting their replacement the Substitute.
